question: Can the respected Mufti Saheb please give me some advice on how to conduct myself while at university and some duas to make my studying easy.
answer:
QUESTION
I am student studying at a university. Can the respected Mufti Saheb please give me some advice on how to conduct myself while at university. What advice can Mufti Saheb give us with regards to the best methods for studying, and some duas for increasing our knowledge and for making the tests and exams easy. Jazakallah. May Allah Ta'ala reward all those what make this excellent service possible.
ANSWER


Share:
A Muslim is always outstanding from non-Muslims in all spheres of life. You should conduct yourself with good character, humility, politeness and simplicity.

Display the excellent teachings of Islam in the simplest and efficient manner. This will attract non-Muslim students as well as teachers to Islam.

Recite after every Salaat verses 25 ? 28 of Surah Taha (20)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
